description:
Financial analysts, accountants, students, and many others are often tasked with creating an amortization schedule. However, not everyone has been taught the proper way to build one from scratch. In this step by step course, I will walk you though building your very own amortization schedule in Microsoft Excel from scratch. The course is packed with information that will help you answer popular questions relating to loans and mortgages.

This course is designed for the beginner Excel user, however the information moves fast enough to keep the attention of more experienced users.

This course is pretty quick, and should be completed in justÂ 30 minutes.

If you want to learn how to calculate a car loan or mortgage, and build an amortization schedule, this course is for your.
title: Creating an Amortization Schedule in Excel
